string-array.name: onboarding_entries
string-array.item: Envelope is an experimental app which temporarily transforms your phone into a simpler, calmer device, helping you to take a break away from your digital world.
Before we begin youâ€™ll need to print out and fold a special envelope.\n\nYou can download a pdf with instructions here
In order to receive calls you will need to make this app the default phone app.\n\nYou should reset this to the phone system dialer when you have finished using the app.
Now place the phone in your envelope and seal it.\n\nYou can lock and unlock your phone using the fingerprint sensor at any time and dial a number.

string-array.name: onboarding_second_pass_entries
string-array.item: In order to receive calls you will need to make this app the default phone app.\n\nYou should reset this to the phone system dialer when you have finished using the app.
Now place the phone in your envelope and seal it.\n\nYou can lock and unlock your phone using the fingerprint sensor at any time and dial a number.
